KAEB HEADQUARTERS
July 31, 19£2
TOs Members of the Board
Gentlemen:
The attached is self-explanatory. I for one would like
to see Mr* Nizami spend the two months visiting NAEB
stations o If you think this is & good idea* 1 will be
glad to writ© to Mr. Fraser and. tell him m will be glad
to arrange such a schedule for Mr. Nizami while he is in
the United States*
Mr. Fraser needs an answer immediately« Hence, I trust
you will scribble a reply to me immediately.
Jim Miles
Executive Director
JSMslX
ccs Robert Hudson
